name: Team16-Verdant
description:
Game Description

In Verdant, you play two unique characters, a Malinois dog and a Kitsune, each representing their respective country. 

The objective of the game is to gather the five godai elements (Fire, Water, Earth, Air, Void) and to bring them back to the central tree to restore the planet's health. To do so, you must complete a platformer / puzzle level for each element. To solve these puzzles, you have to use the special abilities of each character and unravel the mysteries of the world. Enter portals, unlock doors, break walls and use moving platforms to find the hidden element ! 

The artistic style is ukiyoe and the characters' colors are based on their respective countries' flags.

99.9% of the game visuals were created by our artists team ! Actually, only one sprite in the whole game was not homemade ! Will you be able to spot it ?

Verdant was made for the

Belgian Economic Princess Mission to Japan 

Game Jam Belgium x Japan
